title: Please enjoy Bartolo Colonâ€™s photoshoot set to jazz
text:
Please enjoy Bartolo Colonâ€™s photoshoot set to jazz The world needed this. Post to Facebook Please enjoy Bartolo Colonâ€™s photoshoot set to jazz The world needed this.  //ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/bartolo-colon-atlanta-braves-photoshoot-video-jazz-mlb-spring-training/   Please enjoy Bartolo Colonâ€™s photoshoot set to jazz Andrew Joseph 9:36   
Screenshot (Photo: Twitter) 
Bartolo Colon's time with the Atlanta Braves is just beginning, and Atlanta has fully embraced the phenomenon that is "Big Sexy." 
The Braves' social team did the internet a great service on Tuesday and set the video of Colon's photoshoot to some smooth Stevan Carter jazz tunes. Please enjoy: The camera loves you when you're #BigSexy ðŸ˜Ž pic.twitter.com/IgA9ZHHiHg â€” Atlanta Braves (@Braves) February 22, 2017 
We all appreciate this important work. 
I think Colon has found his new walk-up song for 2017. Read or Share this story: http://ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/bartolo-colon-atlanta-braves-photoshoot-video-jazz-mlb-spring-training/ Most Popular
